properties.comment: These are the preamble snippets needed by class HeapHandler in this package
properties.entry: (assert (forall ((u U)) (! (=> (>= (u2i u) 0) (= (fieldIdentifier (arr u)) (u2i u))) :pattern ((arr u))))) (assert (forall ((u U)) (! (exactinstanceof (arr u) sort_Field) :pattern ((arr u)))) )

(assert (forall ((u U)) (! (>= (u2i (length u)) 0) :pattern ((length u)))))
(assert (forall ((u U)) (! (exactinstanceof (length u) sort_int) :pattern ((length u)))))
